alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Windham and southeastern Tolland Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lebanon, or near Windham, moving northeast at 20 mph. This storm was producing frequent lightning and torrential downpours. HAZARD...Frequent lightning and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Killingly, Brooklyn, Columbia, Canterbury, Pomfret, Sterling, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford and Scotland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
